channel.title: Jdk/runserver issue plz help
channel.description:
Ok so when i first tried to run the server it said "please Compile the server first" so i did, but when i tried to compile it said "Please Install JDK 05 or 06" so i installed JDK 6 Update 11 but when i tried it again it said i still didnt have it. I thaught i might ste that i was running from the compiler/runserver thing where you have to type in like "c" to compile or "R" to run. then when i tried to do it sepretley like from just the compiler it worked but when i tried the run server it opend for a sec then closed. I know there are diffirent codes for the runserver currently mine has [code]@echo off color 0a title ParScape v2 - By Airmax java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
can some one post a diffirent code or tell me what to do?

item.title: Jdk/runserver issue plz help

item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

Can you not read? “JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0” Unless you change your environmental variables.
